alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 159 PM EDT/1259 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Mexico Beach, or 14 miles southeast of Callaway, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Overstreet, Honeyville, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Wetappo, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
